alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 14 at 3:30PM HST until December 15 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI LANAI AND BIG ISLAND... .A moderate size, medium period north (350 degree) swell arriving late tonight and peaking Friday morning will produce advisory level surf along many northern exposures. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf 15 to 20 feet along north facing shores. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui, Lanai and Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
